name: hlvc

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cvc), wcel(c0, cnv))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c1 ∈ CVecOLD, c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cvc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cvc))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈ CVecOLD)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ CVecOLD)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cvc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cvc))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈ CVecOLD)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ CVecOLD)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cvc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cvc))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈ CVecOLD)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ CVecOLD)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cvc))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(c1st, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cvc))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(c1st, c0))

comment: Every complex Hilbert space is a complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
